description: She is Yohko`s classmate and best friend. Chikako enjoys eating and making money. She self-proclaims herself as Yohko`s business manager so that only she can decide when Yohko can practice her skills and for how much. Chikako is smart and seems to know much of what happens around her, particularly in school. She stores as much information as possible about her schoolmates in her little Cosio DK-J16 pocket organizer. She also claims to have a great intelligence network for finding information on people.
name: Ogawa Chikako
